verses.roman:
pūrve tumi nirantara laite rāma-nāma
ebe kene nirantara lao kṛṣṇa-nāma''

synonyms: pūrve—formerly; tumi—you; nirantara—constantly; laite—used to chant; rāma-nāma—the holy name of Lord Rāmacandra; ebe—now; kene—why; nirantara—constantly; lao—you chant; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Kṛṣṇa.
translation: "Formerly you were constantly chanting the holy name of Lord Rāma. Why are you now constantly chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa?"
